targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_brate")
  |> window(every: 2s)
  |> group(columns: ["_stop"])
  |> unique(column: "pci")
  |> count(column: "pci")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r["pci"] }))
  |> drop(columns: ["pci"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_brate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ue_id: r["pci"]+"."+r["rnti"]}))
  |> window(every: 2s)
  |> group(columns: ["_stop"])
  |> unique(column: "ue_id")
  |> count(column: "ue_id")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r["ue_id"] }))
  |> drop(columns: ["ue_id"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_brate")
  |> window(every: 1s)
  |> group(columns: ["_stop"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> movingAverage(n: 2)

  |> window(every: 1s)

  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> movingAverage(n: 2)
